about.title: Qawi Najd Engineering Consultancy
about.description: We are a group of accredited engineering offices across the Kingdom, bringing together elite engineers specialized in providing integrated and innovative engineering solutions. We possess extensive experience in engineering consultancy, project management, and technical supervision of government, private, and tourism projects.
about.licensesDescription: We provide services for obtaining all types of engineering licenses and municipal permits, including:

features.design_desc: Professional preparation of interior and exterior designs
features.project_desc: Management of architectural and construction projects
features.license_desc: Technical drawings submission and license documentation

licenses.building: Building licenses for residential units and commercial establishments
licenses.demolish: Demolition and removal licenses according to regulatory requirements
licenses.expansion: Expansion and development permits for existing projects
licenses.all: All types of engineering licenses and official permits
